entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
